resources.string: You can allocate more in the settings.
Choose the result of flicking an episode in a list
%1$d out of %2$d episodes started.\n\nPlayed %3$s out of %4$s.
Calculate actual playtime duration. Two playthroughs are counted twice, marking as played is not.
Sum up all episodes marked as played
(Playback speed is never taken into account.)
Erase playback history for all episodes?
Size of episodes on the device:
Number of new and unplayed episodes
Install an app to send logs to first
Detailed logs may contain sensitive info, like your subscription list
Please ensure the app can access storage.

Reduce the volume for this feed: %1$s Off Light Heavy %1$d concurrent downloads For the whole app Always Never Send… Never When not favorited When not in queue After finishing One hour after finishing %d hours after finishing One day after finishing %d days after finishing %1$d/%2$d selected %1$d/%2$d selected One episode %d episodes Loading more… Episode Notifications Show a notification when a new episode is released. One new episode from %2$s %1$d new episodes from %2$s New Episode New Episodes New subscription episodes. Mark all as played Marked all episodes as played Mark all episodes as played? Mark all episodes in this podcast as played? Remove all \"new\" flags Removed all \"new\" flags Please confirm removal of the \"new\" flag from all episodes. Show info Show podcast settings Podcast settings Rename podcast Remove podcast Share Share… Share File Website address Podcast feed URL Delete the \"%1$s\" podcast and ALL its episodes (including downloaded ones). Please confirm removal of the \"%1$s\" podcast. Files in the local source folder will not be deleted. Removing podcast… Refresh complete podcast Multi select Select all above Select all below Filtered Last refresh failed. Tap to view details. Open Podcast Please wait until the data is loaded… Updates turned off Download Downloading one episode… Downloading %d episodes… Play Pause Stream Delete Unable to delete file. Rebooting the device could help. Delete Episode One episode selected, %d download deleted. %d episodes selected, %d deleted. Remove \"new\" flag Removed \"new\" flag Mark as played Marked as played Marked as unplayed Mark as read Start playback before jumping to a position One episode marked as played. %d episodes marked as played. Mark as unplayed Mark as unread One episode marked as unplayed. %d episodes marked as unplayed. Add to Queue Enqueued One episode added to queue. %d episodes added to queue. Remove from Queue One episode removed from queue. %d episodes removed from queue. Favourite… Remove from \'Favorites\'… Visit Website Skip episode Reset Playback Position Item removed No items selected Done Download pending… Download running… Details %1$s \n\nFile URL:\n%2$s Tap to view details. Could not find storage Not enough space left on your device. HTTP Data Error Unknown Error The podcast server sent a broken podcast feed. Unsupported Feed Type The podcast server sent a website, which is not a podcast. The podcast server does not know where to find the file. It may have been deleted. Connection Error Cannot find the server. Ensure you are connected to the Internet and that the address is typed correctly. Authentication Error Filetype Error No response from the podcast server. Download cancelled Lost connection to the server before completing the download The download was blocked by another app on your device. Could not establish a secure connection. Another app on your device could have blocked the download, or the server certificates could be wrong. Downloads completed with error(s) Auto-downloads completed I/O Error Request Error Database Access Error %d download left %d downloads left Completing… Downloading podcast data… Unknown Title Feed Media file Could not download the file:\u0020 No provided podcast could be shown. Log in A username and password is required Confirm Mobile-data Download (Downloading using mobile data is turned off in the settings.)\n\nYou can choose to either only add the episode to the queue or you can allow downloading temporarily.\n\nYour choice will be remembered for 10 minutes. /Downloading using mobile data is turned off in the settings.)\n\nAllow downloading for 10 min.? Confirm Mobile streaming (Streaming using mobile data is turned off in the settings.) Tap to stream anyway. Always Once Enqueue Allow temporarily Error! The server died Unsupported media type Operation timed out Could not access media file Unknown Error No media playing 00:00:00 Picture-in-picture mode AntennaPod — Unknown media key: %1$d Could not find file No contained media file Lock Queue Unlock Queue Locked Unlocked Locking a queue prevents swiping it or reordering episodes in it. Do not show again Clear Queue Undo Move to top Move to bottom Sort Keep sorted Date Duration Episode title Podcast title Random Smart Shuffle Clear the queue of all of the episodes in it? Time left:\u0020 Presets %1$.2fx is already saved as a preset. No queued episodes Add episodes by downloading them, or long-press one and select \"Enqueue\". This episode has no shownotes. No downloaded episodes Download episodes from the \'Podcast details\' screen. No downloads yet A history of downloads is displayed here. No History Heard episodes are displayed here. No Episodes Added podcasts are displayed here. No new episodes Newly arrived episodes are displayed here. Favourite episodes to see them here Add episodes as favourites by long-pressing them. Add some subscriptions to see them here Press the plus (+) icon below to subscribe to podcasts. Storage Episode auto-deletion, importing, export Project Syncing Sync with other devices using gpodder.net Automation Details Import/Export backup, restore Appearance External elements Interruptions Playback control Reassign hardware buttons Search… No results Clear history Media player Episode Cleanup Episodes poised for removal if \'Auto-downloading\' needs space for new episodes Pause playback when disconnecting headphones or Bluetooth Resume playback when the headphones are reconnected Resume playback when Bluetooth reconnects \"Forward\" Button Customize the \"Forward\" button behavior \"Previous\" Button Customize "\Previous\" button behavior Fast Forward… Rewind… Skip Episode… Restart Episode… Jump to next queue item when playback completes Delete episode when playback completes Auto-delete Smart Mark as Played Mark episodes as played even with less than a set amount of seconds of playtime left Keep Skipped Episodes Keep episodes that are skipped Keep Favourited Episodes Keep episodes marked as favourites Playback Headphone controls, skip intervals, queue Network Update interval, download controls, mobile data Refresh podcasts Pick a specific time or interval to look for new episodes Interval Time Never at %1$s Every hour Every %d hours Continuous Playback Disconnected headphones or Bluetooth Reconnected headphones Reconnected Bluetooth Prefer Streaming Display \"Stream\" button instead of \"Download\" in lists. Mobile Updates Select what should be allowed on mobile data Refreshing podcasts Fetching cover images Auto-downloads Downloading episodes Streaming Interface Appearance, subscriptions, lockscreen Theme Set Navigation Drawer items Change which items appear in the navigation drawer. Set Subscription Order Change the order of your subscriptions Set Subscription Counter Change the info displayed in the subscription counter. Affects sorting of subscriptions if \'Subscription Order\' is set to \'Counter\'. Change appearance. Auto-downloading Set up auto-downloading of episodes. Wi-Fi filter Limit auto-downloading to selected Wi-Fi networks. Download when not charging Auto-download only after charging completes Concurrent Downloads Episode Cache Max. number of downloaded episodes to cache on the device. Auto-downloading is turned off when it is reached. Use Episode Cover Use the episode specific cover in lists whenever available. If unchecked, the app will always use the podcast cover image. Show Remaining Time Display remaining time of episodes when checked. If unchecked, display total duration of episodes. Use system theme Light Dark Black (AMOLED) Unlimited Log in Log in with your gpodder.net account to sync your subscriptions. Log out Logged out Change login information Change gpodder.net login info. Sync… Sync subscription and episode state changes with gpodder.net. Force full synchronization Sync all subscriptions and episode states with gpodder.net. Logged in as %1$s on %2$s Customize variable speed playback Starting playback speed for episodes in this podcast Auto-skip Skip introductions and ending credits. Skip last Skip first Skipped the last %d seconds Skipped the first %d seconds Adjust media info to playback speed Displayed position and duration are adapted to playback speed Fast Forward Skip Time Seconds to skip ahead when the \"Fast forward\" button is clicked. Rewind Skip Time Seconds to go back when the \"Rewind\" button is clicked. High Notification priority Usually expands the notification to show playback buttons. Persistent Playback Controls Keep notification and lockscreen controls when playback is paused. Compact Notification Buttons Change the playback buttons when the notification is collapsed. (Play/pause is always shown.) Too Many Items Select less than %1$d items. Set Lockscreen Background Use current episode\'s image in external players and as lockscreen image. Enqueue Location Add episodes to: %1$s Back Front After current episode Off Documentation and Support Forum Report Bugs Open bug tracker Copy to clipboard Copied to clipboard Experimental Select a media player to play files with Current value: %1$s Proxy Set a network proxy No web browser found. Cast Device Support Playback on external Cast devices (like Chromecast, Audio Speakers or Android TV) Chromecast requires proprietary third-party libraries not found in this libre version of AntennaPod. Enqueue Downloaded Add downloaded episodes to the queue Built-in Android player (deprecated) Sonic Media Player (deprecated) ExoPlayer (recommended) Switch to ExoPlayer Switched to ExoPlayer. Skip Silence in Audio Upon exiting video Behavior when leaving video playback Stop playback Continue audio playback Behavior \"Back\" Button Behavior Change behavior of the back button. Default Open navigation drawer Double tap to exit Confirm to exit Are you sure you want to close AntennaPod? Tap back button again to exit Go to page… Select page Delete removes from Queue Automatically remove an episode from the queue when it is deleted. Subscription Filter Filter your subscriptions in navigation drawer and subscriptions screen. Subscriptions are filtered. Counter greater than zero Auto downloaded Not auto downloaded Kept updated Not kept updated Notification enabled Notification disabled This setting is unique to each podcast. You can change it by opening the podcast page. Contribute About AntennaPod Version Contributors Help AntennaPod any way you can, like coding, translating or by helping forum users. Select all Deselect all OPML export HTML export Database export Database import Replace database of all your current subscriptions and playback history? (Export your current database as a backup beforehand.) Please wait… Could not export database Exported File exported to:\n\n%1$s Grant access to storage to read the OPML file first. Select a file to import Imported Please press \"OK\" to restart AntennaPod This database was exported with a newer AntennaPod than your version can handle. Export Favourites Export all favourites to a file Set sleep timer Turn off sleep timer +%d min Sleep timer Type in a proper time Shake to reset Vibrate shortly before end seconds minutes hours 1 second %d seconds 1 minute %d minutes 1 hour %d hours Auto Sleep timer on Categories Top Suggestions Search on gpodder.net Log in Password and data unprotected! Create account Username Password Gpodder.net is an independent libre podcast-syncing service. Official gpodder.net service Custom Hostname Select Device name AntennaPod on %1$s Existing devices Create device Your gpodder.net account is now linked with your device. Your subscriptions from gpodder.net will auto-sync to your device. Sync… Could not sync subscriptions from gpodder.net Could not perform sync:\u0020 Done Failed Only use letters, digits, hyphens and underscores. Choose Data Folder Please choose the base of your data folder. AntennaPod will create the appropriate sub-directories. %1$s of %2$s available Pause playback instead of lowering volume for other playback Pause for Interruptions Resume playback after a phone calls Resume after Call Restart the app to use the new settings. Subscribe Subscribing… Preview Stop preview Rewind Fast forward Faster Slower Video Downloading episode… The episode is enqueued Favourited episode Next page… Position: %1$s Apply action Play chapter Previous chapter Next chapter Log in Change your username and password for this podcast and its episodes. Folders Pick folders to show this podcast in. Show in main list Auto-downloading Episode Filter Terms to prevent or auto-download episodes Include Exclude Single words \n\"Multiple Words\" Keep Updated Include this podcast when (auto-)refreshing all podcasts Auto-downloading turned of in the main settings Listened for: Episodes on the device: Space used: For all podcasts » Importing subscriptions from single-purpose apps… Search for podcast… Search on iTunes Search on Podcastindex.org Search on fyyd Advanced Add podcast RSS address www.example.com/feed Browse gpodder.net Discover Hide You hid suggestions. more » Suggestions from iTunes Results by %1$s Add local folder Local folder Re-connect local folder Use this to re-connect to the same folder. Do not select another folder if you want to refresh permissions. A virtual podcast created by adding a folder to AntennaPod. Could not start the system file-manager Filter Favourited Not favourited Downloaded Not downloaded Queued Not queued Has media No media Paused Not paused Played Not played Title (A - Z) Title (Z - A) Date (new - old) Date (old - new) Duration (short - long) Duration (long - short) A - Z Z - A New - old Old - new Short - long Long - short Like AntennaPod? Appreciate the work it took to create it by telling others. No thanks Remind me later Sure thing pal! Include: Playback position Media-file address Episode webpage Media file Audio controls Playback Speed Audio Effects Downmix: Stereo in mono Sonic only ExoPlayer only Type Host Port (Optional) Test Checking… Done Test failed Enter a host first Enter a valid Host- IP address or domain first Pick a proper port first Number of columns Play On… Disconnect from cast device… Media incompatible with cast device Could not start playback Could not stop playback Could not pause playback Could not adjust volume Could not connect to the cast device Re-establishing lost connection to the cast device… Could not sync to the cast device Could not seek to the new position on the cast device Could not work with the receiving player Skipping unplayable media… Errors News Action required Displayed for required actions, like entering passwords. Downloading… Displayed while downloading. Currently playing Allows playback control. The main notification displayed while playing a podcast. Download failed Displayed when a download or feed update fails. Syncing failed Displayed when gpodder.net syncing fails. Auto-download completed Displayed when episodes are auto-downloaded. New Episode Displayed when for new podcast episodes Widgets New widget Opacity Settings updated. Do you want stream buttons available in episode lists? Do you want download buttons in episode lists?
